mapper.select: SELECT r.id, r.name, r.available FROM sys_role r LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON r.id = ur.sys_role_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON ur.sys_user_id = u.id WHERE u.username = #{username}
SELECT r.id, r.name FROM sys_role r WHERE r.available = 1 AND r.id = (SELECT ur.sys_role_id FROM sys_user_role ur WHERE ur.sys_user_id = #{id})

SELECT p.* FROM sys_permission p,sys_role_permission rp WHERE rp.sys_permission_id=p.id AND p.available=1 AND rp.sys_role_id IN
#{item}

SELECT u.id, u.username, u.age, u.sex, u.nickname, u.is_delete, r.id roleId, r.name roleName FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON (u.id = ur.sys_user_id) LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON (ur.sys_role_id = r.id)
AND u.username LIKE '%${search}%'
order by u.id
